Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>I obviously can't fix the Skyview Tower.
Wish I knew of some way to get to
the top...
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Are you the one who got the elevator
working?<sp:5:0:0> You're amazing!

<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0801><sp:0:2:2:6400>I'll get to work fixing the Skyview Tower
right away.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Are you the one who got the elevator
working?<sp:5:0:0> I came to fix the terminal in the
Skyview Tower here but got stuck below.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Anyway, I'll get to repairing the tower
right away!
Talk_13:
<snd:Think_00>Uh-oh.<sp:5:1:0> The drive-assembly mechanism is
stuck, probably from all the hot, hot hours
of the day here.
But if I swap out those parts for
heat-resistant ones...<sp:5:1:0> Yes!<sp:5:0:0> It worked!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Thanks to you, I could fix the Skyview
Tower!<sp:5:1:0> Please, take this for your trouble.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I hate to break it to you, but the Skyview
Tower is out of order.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I'm here to fix it, but unfortunately, the
elevator is broken too!<sp:5:0:0> I can't get up to
the tower to make the repairs.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_01>Do you see the metal bit up there?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>There used to be a platform attached to
that. If you added enough weight, it'd go
down...<sp:5:0:0>and I'd go up.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>But the platform is gone. There's nothing
attached to that metal bit, so I'm stuck
down here.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>There used to be a platform attached to
the metal bit up there.<sp:5:0:0> You could <clr:0000>put
weight on it to make this platform move<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But the other platform is gone. <sp:5:1:0>I'm
thinking of just giving up for now and
coming back another time.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you're heading to the desert, <sp:5:1:0>make sure
to protect yourself from the heat. It can
get dangerous out there.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>Sometimes there's just no avoiding the
heat.<sp:5:0:0> When that happens, a meal that'll
cool you down should come in handy.
